entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the Wraps of Dyamak reach an exalted state, they gain the following properties:

items: The bonus to attack and damage rolls with your unarmed strike increases to +3.

When you hit with an unarmed strike, you can choose to make the attack a ravenous strike. The target takes an extra {@damage 6d6} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. This property of the wraps can't be used again until you finish a {@quickref resting|PHB|2|0|long rest}, or until you score a critical hit with an unarmed strike against a hostile creature.
